events.name: Life Cycle Inventories Creation
events.wd_description: The life cycle inventories are created for three battery types and their respective supply chains.
events.description: The life cycle inventories are created for three battery types and their respective supply chains.

events.name: BatPac 5.0 model
events.wd_description: Uses a specific method for creating life cycle inventories.
events.description: Uses a specific method for creating life cycle inventories.

events.name: GREET 2021 model
events.wd_description: Uses another method for creating life cycle inventories.

events.name: Engels et al.

events.name: Influence of location on sustainability dimensions
events.wd_label: Influence of location on sustainability dimensions
events.wd_description: The investigated scenarios show that location can significantly influence the results of all three sustainability dimensions, varying depending on the locations and processes considered.
events.description: The investigated scenarios show that location can significantly influence the results of all three sustainability dimensions, varying depending on the locations and processes considered.

events.name: Environmental impact
events.wd_description: The environmental impact of battery production varies significantly based on the location of the production facilities.
events.description: The environmental impact of battery production varies significantly based on the location of the production facilities.

events.name: Social impact
events.wd_description: The social impact of battery production also varies depending on the location, with different countries having different social implications.
events.description: The social impact of battery production also varies depending on the location, with different countries having different social implications.

events.name: Economic impact
events.wd_description: The economic impact of battery production is influenced by the location, affecting costs and investment returns.
events.description: The economic impact of battery production is influenced by the location, affecting costs and investment returns.
